description: Enterprise techniques used by Gamaredon Group, ATT&CK group G0047 v1.0
name: Gamaredon Group (G0047)

techniques.comment: A [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) file stealer can communicate over HTTP for C2.
A [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) file stealer has the capability to steal data from newly connected logical volumes on a system, including USB drives.
A [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) file stealer can gather the victim's computer name and drive serial numbers to send to a C2 server.

techniques.techniqueName: Exfiltration Over Command and Control Channel
techniques.comment: A [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) file stealer transfers collected files to a hardcoded C2 server.
[Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) tools contained an application to check performance of USB flash drives.
Tools used by [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) are capable of downloading and executing additional payloads.
A [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) file stealer can gather the victim's username to send to a C2 server.
[Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has used various batch scripts to establish C2, download additional files, and conduct other functions.
